channel.title: Undue Alarm
channel.description:
I finally learned how to properly use the powerful Source Recorder, so I managed to get some spare time (12 hours) and film something very short.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tZvC_kfVnZw[/url]
The actual recording in game took about 2 hours (included the time when I recorded, and when I replayed & video captured it) and the post processing took 10 hours. If you don't recognize that awesome music, gtfo :smiley:
The reason I posted it here is because I need to hear from you what does this movie miss, or something that needs to be kicked out. I'm planing something bigger this month, so ideas will be appreciated.
[url='https://www.joelnielsen.com']www.joelnielsen.com - awesome music comes from here[/url]

item.title: Undue Alarm
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
It’s a lot better than what you end up seeing in-game. The music was nice, but I don’t recognize it so unfortunately I must leave.

Read full topic
